item.title: Elizabeth Olsen’s 2025 MCU Return Creates The Perfect Opportunity For Marvel To Challenge Scarlet Witch’s Biggest Franchise Streak
item.description: Elizabeth Olsen is coming back as the Scarlet Witch in a 2025 MCU project, and it could start Wanda's biggest franchise streak of appearances.

item.title: Why One Of Ridley Scott's Next Movies Is In A Genre He's Never Done Before: "I Like Being On Thin Ice"
item.description: Ridley Scott opens up about why one of his next movies is in a genre he's never done before, explaining what influenced his decision to tackle it.

item.title: Jonathan Majors: Charges, MCU Exit & Where The Actor Is Now, Explained
item.description: After his MCU debut as Kang the Conqueror in Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania, Jonathan Majors was convicted of assault. Here's what's going on now.
